mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_tel, d.dept_name, p.pos_name, TO_CHAR(e.emp_join_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') emp_join_date, emp_picture, emp_zip, emp_addr1, emp_addr2 FROM emp e JOIN ( SELECT * FROM emp_history WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no} ORDER BY dept_startdate DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) eh ON e.emp_no = eh.emp_no JOIN dept d ON eh.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN pos p ON eh.pos_no = p.pos_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no}

SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_tel, d.dept_name, p.pos_name, SUBSTR(emp_rrn, 1, 6) emp_rrn, TO_CHAR(e.emp_join_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') emp_join_date, emp_picture, emp_zip, emp_addr1, emp_addr2 FROM emp e JOIN ( SELECT * FROM emp_history WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no} ORDER BY dept_startdate DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) eh ON e.emp_no = eh.emp_no JOIN dept d ON eh.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN pos p ON eh.pos_no = p.pos_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no}

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM wr.work_starttime) AS work_year, e.emp_name, COUNT(CASE WHEN wr.work_status = 0 THEN 1 END) AS work_Count, COUNT(CASE WHEN wr.work_status = 1 THEN 1 END) AS workLate_Count, COUNT(CASE WHEN wr.work_status = 2 THEN 1 END) AS workAbsence_Count, COUNT(CASE WHEN wr.work_status = 3 THEN 1 END) AS workLateEarly_Count FROM worktime_recode wr JOIN emp e ON e.emp_no = wr.emp_no WHERE wr.emp_no = #{emp_no} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM wr.work_starttime), e.emp_name

SELECT eh.dept_no, TO_CHAR(eh.dept_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') dept_startdate, TO_CHAR(eh.dept_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') dept_enddate, d.dept_name FROM emp_history eh JOIN dept d ON eh.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE eh.emp_no = #{emp_no}

SELECT eh.pos_no, TO_CHAR(eh.pos_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') pos_startdate, TO_CHAR(eh.pos_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') pos_enddate, p.pos_name FROM emp_history eh JOIN pos p ON eh.pos_no = p.pos_no WHERE eh.emp_no = #{emp_no}

SELECT d.dept_no, d.dept_name, d.dept_status, NVL(d.top_dept_no, 0) top_dept_no, d2.dept_name top_dept_name FROM dept d JOIN dept d2 ON d2.dept_no = d.top_dept_no WHERE d.dept_status = 0 ORDER BY top_dept_no
